clip.quote: Reach out to your local newspaper. These people are overworked and need content. If you help them, they will call you back.
clip.why_clipworthy: Provides a clear, actionable strategy for gaining media exposure.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to be the go-to real estate expert in your area? Here's how to get the media to call you!

```json
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Want to be the go-to real estate expert in your area? Here's how to get the media to call you!",
```

clip.quote: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go as a team.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of teamwork in achieving long-term success.
clip.suggested_hook: Are you trying to do it all alone? Here's why building a team is crucial for lasting success.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Are you trying to do it all alone? Here's why building a team is crucial for lasting success.",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Leah Canfield, a former athlete turned luxury real estate expert. She knows the power of teamwork in achieving long-term goals.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Leah shares, 'If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go as a team.' This wisdom is key in real estate, where collaboration can elevate your brand and client trust.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) Think about your business. Are you leveraging the strengths of a team to build credibility and achieve sustainable growth?",
```
